com.nhn.android.maps.overlay

Class NMapCircleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.overlay.NMapCircleData

  • public class NMapCircleData
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a circle data on map view overlay.

        the bounds of circle data in UTMK coordinates.

      • isValidBounds

        public boolean isValidBounds()

      • getBoundsOffset

        public android.graphics.Point getBoundsOffset(NMapView mapView,
                                     boolean isDrawnOnSnapshot)
        Get bounds offset of the path data with respect to the bounds after zoom levels changed. Note: This is used to not evaluate screen pixel coordinates for every rendering of path data without changing zoom levels.
        Returns:
        bounds offset in screen coordinates.

      • onSizeChanged

        public void onSizeChanged(int width,
                 int height)

      • addCirclePoint

        public NMapCirclePoint addCirclePoint(int utmkX,
                             int utmkY,
                             float radius)
        Add a circle point in UTMK coordinates.
        Parameters:
        utmkX - x coordinates of a circle point.
        utmkX - y coordinates of a circle point.
        radius - radius of a circle point in meters. This value could be 0 if circle style is image, otherwise must be > 0.

      • addCirclePoint

        public NMapCirclePoint addCirclePoint(double longitude,
                             double latitude,
                             float radius)
        Add a circle point in GRS coordinates.
        Parameters:
        longitude - x coordinates of a circle point.
        latitude - y coordinates of a circle point.
        radius - radius of a circle point in meters. This value could be 0 if circle style is image, otherwise must be > 0.

      • endCircleData

        public void endCircleData()
        End of circle data.

      • setCircleStyle

        public void setCircleStyle(NMapCircleStyle circleStyle)
        set default circle style. if not specified, default circle style is used.
        Parameters:
        circleStyle - circle style

      • getCircleStyle

        public NMapCircleStyle getCircleStyle()
        get default circle style.
